text:
The new Hvala has just reopened! Different vibes now! Feels energetic, bright and cheerful. They have also updated their menu! I had the matcha strawberry and itâ€™s really good, much better than the other one I had at another place.

Also the matcha petite cake just looks so good. Iâ€™m usually not a huge fan of cakes and desserts as I find most of them being too sweet. But Hvala nailed the proportion perfectly and you canâ€™t stop eating bite after bite. Definitely must come and try if you are around the area.

There is Fairprice Finest here and many affordable dining places here. It is rather quiet and not so crowded, which I appreciate. I was sitting at the concierge area waiting for my kids who were in the restroom and I saw a male security guard patiently guiding his colleague on the carpark redemption.

The mutton and chicken were both delicious and authentic. The rice was slightly over done but the meat was very soft and very well cooked. They use quality ingredients and that shows in the results. The kulfi was fantastic. Mutton 15 chicken 9

Singapore city is a very modern city. have good transportation facilities. I got off in Somerset with clean roads and people who were orderly in traffic. Many tall buildings are part hotels and shopping centers. I came here with our family to enjoy a trip to Singapore.

Our first visit! Chanced upon the place from Chope and no regrets at all. Great wine, great food ðŸ˜Š both of us had the set which included a wine together with a bowl of mussels and a mains (we got the crispy pork knuckles).  Nothing to nitpick really.  Service was great too! We were checked in often and our glasses were topped too ðŸ˜Š

Will be back for sure!
